use_cases_desc:
Newspaper search application, allows faceted search with coordinated views.
Follows Shneiderman's "overview first, zoom and filter, then details-on-demand"
contribution_desc: Comparing efficiency of faceted search between tabletop interface and 4-tablet assembly. Users prefer tabletop, but no negative impact in search performance.
crossdevice_def: Not directly, but use "Multiple Coordinated Views" (MCV) for defining the split of viz across devices.
